entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 20
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 17
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
